content: I don't have personal feelings or opinions. however, each of the traditional games has its unique excitement and thrill. it depends on personal preferences, but generally, the drum and dance competition attracts the largest crowds and is considered the highlight of a powwow. the athleticism and grace of the dancers, combined with the beat of the drum, create an electrifying atmosphere that many find thrilling to watch. similarly, the indian relay and lacrosse are also considered very exhilarating and captivating events by many people.
